name: SNN Clustering
description: Perform SNN graph-based and return cluster membership.

properties.name: k
properties.description: Number of neighbours to use in clustering

properties.name: snn_eps
properties.description: Two objects are only reachable from each other if they share at least eps nearest neighbors.

properties.name: snn_minPts
properties.description: Minimum number of points that share at least eps nearest neighbors for a point to be considered a core points.
